properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

This spacious four bedroom detached house is located in a quiet and well-established residential neighbourhood, offering an ideal living environment for growing families. The property features a generously sized living room, a modern fitted kitchen with ample storage, a separate dining area, and a well-maintained private garden. Each bedroom is well-proportioned, providing comfortable personal space, while the overall layout ensures excellent natural light and ventilation throughout the home.

Situated within close proximity to reputable schools, local shops, and essential amenities, this property offers both convenience and comfort. Excellent transport links provide easy access to nearby town centres and commuter routes, making it suitable for professionals as well as families. The peaceful surroundings combined with practical living spaces make this home a strong long-term investment opportunity.

This well-presented one bedroom apartment is ideally located close to a wide range of local amenities and transport links, making it perfect for first-time buyers or investors. The property features a bright open-plan living and kitchen area, a modern fitted bathroom, and a spacious bedroom designed for comfortable everyday living. The apartment is finished to a good standard throughout and benefits from an efficient layout that maximises available space.

The surrounding area offers excellent access to public transport, shopping facilities, and dining options, ensuring a convenient urban lifestyle. With its central location and low-maintenance appeal, this property represents an excellent opportunity for those seeking a practical and affordable home in a well-connected area.

This impressive five bedroom luxury home offers extensive living space across two well-designed floors, making it ideal for larger families or those seeking premium accommodation. The property boasts multiple reception rooms, a high-end fitted kitchen with quality appliances, and a beautifully landscaped garden suitable for both relaxation and entertaining. The interior design reflects a high standard of finish with attention to detail throughout.

Located in a highly desirable residential area, the property benefits from excellent transport links, reputable schools, and nearby recreational facilities. The combination of generous internal space, modern features, and a prestigious location makes this property a standout option for buyers looking for comfort, privacy, and long-term value.

This modern three bedroom apartment is situated in a vibrant and well-connected city location, offering contemporary living with excellent convenience. The property features a spacious open-plan living and dining area, a modern fitted kitchen, and access to a private balcony that provides additional outdoor space. The bedrooms are well-sized, making the apartment suitable for families or shared living arrangements.

Residents benefit from immediate access to public transport links, local shops, restaurants, and other essential services. The propertyâ€™s central location and modern design make it particularly attractive to professionals seeking an urban lifestyle, as well as investors looking for strong rental potential.

This charming two bedroom starter home is located in a peaceful residential area, offering a welcoming and comfortable living environment. The property includes a cosy living room, a fitted kitchen with sufficient storage space, and a private rear garden ideal for outdoor activities or relaxation. The layout is practical and well-suited for small families or first-time buyers.

The home is conveniently positioned close to local schools, shops, and transport links, providing easy access to nearby town centres. Its combination of affordability, location, and functional design makes it an excellent choice for buyers entering the property market or seeking a low-maintenance family home.
